original_text:
Their tents and their flocks shall be taken,
    their curtains and all their goods;
their camels shall be led away from them,
    and men shall cry to them: ‘Terror on every side!’
korean_text: 너희는 그들의 장막과 양 떼를 빼앗으며 휘장과 모든 기구와 낙타를 빼앗아다가 소유로 삼고 그들을 향하여 외치기를 두려움이 사방에 있다 할지니라

sentences.original_text: Their tents and their flocks shall be taken
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 장막과 양 떼는 빼앗길 것이며

sentences.original_text: their curtains and all their goods
their camels shall be led away from them
and men shall cry to them
